description: All sorts of clothing related stuff. Putting your shirt inside out, getting into your favourite outfit and so on. There is no command to get naked, although there are commands to be shirtless/pantless. (Also includes things like putting smelly socks in your mouth)
commands: Turn around your shirt, so the back is in the front
Find the smelliest socks you have and put them into your mouth
Find the dirtiest underwear you have and wear it onto your head
Get your finest clothing and put it on
Wear a pair of socks as gloves
